title: I'm through with it.
body:
This new HUD is terrible.  gave it a chance for a week, but nope, I can't stand it. I can't see half the colours, it bulky, confusing and generally annoying. Give us an option to use the old HUD please.

EDIT: It's okay, i found a mod for old one. Issue Resolved.
